summary: [simple_description] A 2D game development template built with Phaser 3 and TypeScript.

directories.summary: Main game source code containing scenes, game objects, and game initialization logic.
Game scenes that handle different states of the game (boot, menu, gameplay).
Game object classes like Player and Enemy with their specific behaviors and properties.
Game assets including sprites, audio files, and tilemaps used in the game.
Express server for multiplayer functionality and serving the built game in production.
Webpack configuration for development and production builds.
